scripts.setGitIdentity: git config --global user.email 'gr.innie+github@gmail.com' && git config --global user.name 'grinnius'
scripts.commitBuildInfo: git add ./LeaveMyTextAlone/buildInfo.json && git commit -m 'Update build number and timestamp' || echo 'No changes to commit'
scripts.pushBuildInfo: git remote set-url origin https://${GITHUB_TOKEN}@github.com/grinnius/leave-my-text-alone.git && git push origin main
scripts.build: npm run setGitIdentity && npm run updateBuildInfo
